TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceBase extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 为将作为服务应用程序的一部分而存在的服务提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for a service that will exist as part of a service application.

summary.span: 在创建新的服务类时，必须从 派生。

span.span: must be derived from when creating a new service class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在服务应用程序中定义服务类时, 派生自。Derive from when defining your service class in a service application. 任何有用的服务都将重写和方法。Any useful service overrides the and methods. 对于其他功能, 可以重写和 , 以响应服务状态的更改。For additional functionality, you can override and with specific behavior in response to changes in the service state. 服务是长时间运行的可执行文件, 它不支持用户界面, 而且可能不会在登录用户帐户下运行。A service is a long-running executable that does not support a user interface, and which might not run under the logged-on user account. 此服务可以在没有任何用户登录到计算机的情况下运行。The service can run without any user being logged on to the computer. 默认情况下, 服务在系统帐户下运行, 该帐户不是管理员帐户。By default, services run under the System account, which is not the same as the Administrator account. 不能更改系统帐户的权限。You cannot change the rights of the System account. 或者, 你可以使用来指定将在其下运行服务的用户帐户。Alternatively, you can use a to specify a user account under which the service will run. 可执行文件可以包含多个服务, 但每个服务必须包含单独的服务。An executable can contain more than one service but must contain a separate for each service. 实例向系统注册该服务。The instance registers the service with the system. 安装程序还将每个服务与可用于记录服务命令的事件日志相关联。The installer also associates each service with an event log that you can use to record service commands. 可`main()`执行文件中的函数定义应运行哪些服务。The `main()` function in the executable defines which services should run. 服务的当前工作目录是系统目录, 而不是可执行文件所在的目录。The current working directory of the service is the system directory, not the directory in which the executable is located. 启动服务时, 系统将查找可执行文件, 并运行该服务的方法, 该方法包含在可执行文件中。When you start a service, the system locates the executable and runs the method for that service, contained within the executable. 但是, 运行该服务与运行可执行文件不同。However, running the service is not the same as running the executable. 可执行文件只会加载服务。The executable only loads the service. 服务可通过服务控制管理器进行访问 (例如, 已启动和停止)。The service is accessed (for example, started and stopped) through the Service Control Manager. 第一次在服务上调用时, 可执行文件调用派生类的构造函数。The executable calls the derived class's constructor the first time you call Start on the service. 命令处理方法将在构造函数执行后立即调用。The command-handling method is called immediately after the constructor executes. 在第一次加载服务后, 不会再次执行构造函数, 因此, 需要将由构造函数执行的处理与执行的过程分离。The constructor is not executed again after the first time the service has been loaded, so it is necessary to separate the processing performed by the constructor from that performed by . 应在中 创建可以由释放的任何资源。Any resources that can be released by should be created in . 如果在释放资源后再次启动了服务, 则在构造函数中创建资源可防止正确创建这些资源。Creating resources in the constructor prevents them from being created properly if the service is started again after has released the resources. 服务控制管理器 (SCM) 提供了一种与服务交互的方式。The Service Control Manager (SCM) provides a way to interact with the service. 可以使用 SCM 将开始、停止、暂停、继续或自定义命令传递到服务中。You can use the SCM to pass Start, Stop, Pause, Continue, or custom commands into the service. SCM 使用和的值来确定服务是否接受 "停止"、"暂停" 或 "继续" 命令。The SCM uses the values of and to determine whether the service accepts Stop, Pause, or Continue commands. 仅当相应的属性 `true`或在服务类中时, 才会在 SCM 的上下文菜单中启用 "停止"、"暂停" 和 "继续"。Stop, Pause, and Continue are enabled in the SCM's context menus only if the corresponding property or is `true` in the service class. 如果启用, 则会将命令传递到服务, 并调用、或 。If enabled, the command is passed to the service, and , , or is called. 如果、 或为,`false`则不会处理相应的命令处理方法 ( 如), 即使您已实现了方法也是如此。 If , , or is `false`, the corresponding command-handling method (such as ) will not be processed, even if you have implemented the method. 可以使用类以编程方式使用用户界面执行 SCM 操作。You can use the class to do programmatically what the SCM does using a user interface. 可以自动执行控制台中提供的任务。You can automate the tasks available in the console. 如果、 或为,`true`但尚未实现相应的命令处理方法 (如), 则系统将引发异常并忽略命令。 If , , or is `true` but you have not implemented a corresponding command-handling method (such as ) the system throws an exception and ignores the command. 无需在中 实现、 或任何其他方法。You do not have to implement , , or any other method in . 但是, 此服务的行为在中进行了描述, 因此至少应重写此成员。However, the service's behavior is described in , so at minimum, this member should be overridden. 可`main()`执行文件的函数通过调用方法, 将可执行文件中的服务注册到服务控制管理器。The `main()` function of the executable registers the service in the executable with the Service Control Manager by calling the method. 传递给 方法的对象的属性必须与该服务的服务安装程序的属性相匹配。The property of the object passed to the method must match the property of the service installer for that service. 您可以使用`InstallUtil.exe`在您的系统上安装服务。You can use `InstallUtil.exe` to install services on your system. > [!NOTE] > 您可以指定除应用程序事件日志以外的日志来接收服务调用的通知, 但 属性和属性都不能写入自定义日志。You can specify a log other than the Application event log to receive notification of service calls, but neither the nor the property can write to a custom log. 如果你`false`不希望使用自动日志记录, 则设置为。Set to `false` if you do not want to use automatic logging.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿创建类的实例。Do not create an instance of the class. 相反, 派生自并实例化派生类。Instead, derive from and instantiate your derived class. 在从继承的类的构造函数中实现所需的最小值是在组件上设置。The minimum you need to implement in the constructor for a class inherited from is to set the on your component. 构造函数中不特别需要其他处理。No other processing is specifically required in the constructor. 你应在中处理大多数初始化, 而不是在构造函数中。You should handle most initialization in rather than in the constructor. 否则, 在服务停止后重新启动该服务时, 对象将重新初始化。Otherwise, there is no guarantee the objects will be reinitialized when you restart a service after it has been stopped. 如果重写派生类中的构造函数, 请在代码中调用基类构造函数。If you override the constructor in your derived class, call the base class constructor in your code. 构造函数将设置`true`为。 The constructor sets to `true`. 如果你不希望从服务控制管理器 (SCM) 自动记录对服务的调用, 请将设置为`false`。If you do not want to automatically log calls to the service from the Service Control Manager (SCM), set to `false`. 如果可执行文件包含单个服务, 则在从 SCM 中选择 "启动" 时, 系统会调用服务的构造函数, 如果调用了 Stop, 则会运行析构函数。If the executable contains a single service, the system calls the service's constructor when Start is selected from the SCM, and runs the destructor if Stop is called. 如果可执行文件包含多个服务, 则对一个服务调用 "启动" 将导致为可执行文件中的所有服务调用构造函数, 但只启动指定的服务。If the executable contains multiple services, calling Start on one service causes the constructors to be called for all services in the executable, but only the specified service is started. 所有服务都已停止时, 服务的析构函数会一起运行, 而不会在每个服务停止时单独运行。Destructors for the services are run together when all services have been stopped, not individually when each service is stopped. > [!NOTE] > 如果重写基类构造函数, 则应在派生类的构造函数中显式调用它。If you override the base class constructor, you should explicitly call it in the constructor of your derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoLog { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoLog : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示是否在事件日志中报告“开始”、“停止”、“暂停”以及“继续”命令。

span.span: Indicates whether to report Start, Stop, Pause, and Continue commands in the event log.

value.span: 为 时在事件日志中报告信息；否则为 。

span.span: to report information in the event log; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 以`true`指示服务使用应用程序事件日志报告命令失败, 并指示服务上的 "启动"、"停止"、"暂停" 和 "继续" 事件的状态更改信息。Setting to `true` instructs the service to use the Application event log to report command failures, as well as state change information for Start, Stop, Pause, and Continue events on the service. 服务的名称将用作日志的名称。The name of the service is used as the log's . 若要将信息报告给自定义事件日志而不是应用程序日志`false` , 请将设置为, 并在命令处理方法、 或中写入说明, 以发布到适当的日志。To report information to a custom event log rather than the Application log, set to `false` and write instructions within the command-handling methods , , or to post to the appropriate log. > [!NOTE] > 在服务尝试写入事件日志之前, 必须设置用于提供事件日志的源字符串的。The , which supplies the source string for the event log, must be set before the service attempts to write to the event log. 尝试在设置源名称之前访问事件日志会引发异常。Trying to access the event log before the source name is set throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHandlePowerEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanHandlePowerEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务是否可以处理计算机电源状态更改通知。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can handle notifications of computer power status changes.

value.span: 如果服务处理 类中指示的计算机电源状态更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service handles the computer power status changes indicated in the class, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当计算机电源状态更改时, 服务控制管理器 (SCM) 使用的值验证服务是否接受电源事件命令。When the computer power status changes, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies whether the service accepts power event commands using the value of . 如果 为`true`, 则将该命令传递到服务, 并在定义时调用方法。If is `true`, the command is passed to the service and the method is called if defined. 如果未在派生类中实现, 则 SCM 通过空基类方法处理电源事件。If is not implemented in the derived class, the SCM handles the power event through the empty base class method.

exception.span: 此属性将在服务启动后被修改。

span.span: This property is modified after the service was started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHandleSessionChangeEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanHandleSessionChangeEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务是否可以处理从终端服务器会话接收到的会话更改事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service can handle session change events received from a Terminal Server session.

value.span: 如果服务可以处理终端服务器会话更改事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service can handle Terminal Server session change events; otherwise, .

exception.span: 此属性将在服务启动后被修改。

span.span: This property is modified after the service was started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanPauseAndContinue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanPauseAndContinue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示服务是否可以暂停并再继续的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can be paused and resumed.

value.span: 如果服务可以暂停，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service can be paused; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务的构造函数中设置属性的值。Set the value of the property in the constructor for the service. 服务暂停时, 它会暂停正在进行的操作。When a service is paused, it halts what it is doing. 当你通过服务控制管理器或以编程方式继续服务时, 将运行。When you continue the service (either through the Service Control Manager or programmatically), runs. 向服务发送暂停请求可以节省系统资源。Sending a Pause request to the service can conserve system resources. 暂停可能不会释放所有系统资源, 而是停止。Pause may not release all system resources, but Stop does. 和通常用于执行比和更少的处理。 and are often implemented to perform less processing than and . 当为`true`时, 重写并指定在服务控制管理器 (SCM) 向服务传递暂停或继续请求时应发生的处理。When is `true`, override and to specify the processing that should occur when the Service Control Manager (SCM) passes a Pause or Continue request to your service. 应实现以撤消中的处理。 should be implemented to undo the processing in . 如果 为`false`, 则 SCM 将不会向服务传递暂停或继续请求, 因此, 不会调用和方法, 即使它们是实现的。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if they are implemented. 在`Pause` SCM 中, 在为`Continue` `false`时禁用和控件。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanShutdown { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanShutdown : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示系统关闭时是否应通知服务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service should be notified when the system is shutting down.

value.span: 如果系统关闭时应通知服务，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service should be notified when the system is shutting down; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为`true`, 则在系统关闭时通知服务。If is `true`, the service is notified when the system is shutting down. 关机时, 如果已在派生类中实现, 则调用方法。At shutdown, the method is called if it has been implemented in your derived class. > [!NOTE] > 只有系统会导致执行方法; 服务可以调用该方法, 但这不是建议的方法。Only the system should cause the method to execute; the service can call it, but this is not recommended.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanStop : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务启动后是否可以停止。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can be stopped once it has started.

value.span: 如果服务可以停止并调用了 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service can be stopped and the method called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对服务调用 "停止" 时, 服务控制管理器 (SCM) 使用的值验证服务是否接受停止命令。When Stop is called on a service, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies whether the service accepts Stop commands using the value of . 对于大多数服务, 的值为`true`, 但某些操作系统服务不允许用户将其停止。For most services, the value of is `true`, but some operating system services, for example, do not allow the user to stop them. 如果 为`true`, 则将停止命令传递给服务, 如果定义了方法, 则调用方法。If is `true`, the Stop command is passed to the service and the method is called if it is defined. 如果未在派生类中实现, 则 SCM 通过空基类方法处理 Stop 命令。If is not implemented in the derived class, the SCM handles the Stop command through the empty base class method.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用派生类完成后, 在派生类中调用, 在派生类中调用, 并在类中调用。Call in your derived class (and through it, in the class) when you are finished using the derived class. 方法使派生类处于不可用状态。The method leaves the derived class in an unusable state. 调用之后, 必须释放对派生类的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收可以回收它们占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the derived class and so the memory they were occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 在您释放对派生自的类的最后一个引用之前, 始终调用。Always call before you release your last reference to the class derived from . 否则, 在垃圾回收调用对象的析构函数之前, 将不会释放资源和派生类。Otherwise, the resources and the derived class are using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the objects' destructors. 通常实现来处理中的代码, 并结合对的调用。 is often implemented to process the code in , combined with a call to . 如果在派生类中选择执行此操作, 则可通过实现来分配任何已释放的。If you choose to do this in your derived class, it is customary to implement to allocate whatever released.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property EventLog As EventLog
public: virtual property System::Diagnostics::EventLog ^ EventLog { System::Diagnostics::EventLog ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个事件日志，它可用于将服务命令调用的通知（如“开始”和“停止”）写入“应用程序”事件日志。

span.span: Gets an event log you can use to write notification of service command calls, such as Start and Stop, to the Application event log.

value.span: 实例，它的源注册到 Application 日志中。

span.span: An instance whose source is registered to the Application log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将属性初始化为具有和属性集的实例。The constructor initializes the property to an instance with the and properties set. 源是服务的, 日志是计算机的应用程序日志。The source is the of the service, and the log is the computer's Application log. 这些值是自动设置的, 不能更改以自动记录服务命令。These values are set automatically and cannot be changed for automatic logging of service commands. 当 为`true`时, 会自动在应用程序事件日志中记录 "启动"、"停止"、"暂停"、"继续" 和自定义命令。When is `true`, Start, Stop, Pause, Continue, and custom commands are recorded automatically in the Application event log. 还可以使用属性将其他消息写入该日志。You can use the property to write additional messages to that log as well. 组件使用此 成员进行调用。The component calls using this member. 若要将信息报告给自定义事件日志而不是应用程序日志`false` , 请将设置为, 并在命令处理方法、 或中写入说明, 以发布到适当的日志。To report information to a custom event log rather than the Application log, set to `false` and write instructions within the command-handling methods , , or to post to the appropriate log.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ExitCode { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ExitCode : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置服务的退出代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code for the service.
The exit code for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将该属性设置为一个非零值, 然后停止该服务以向服务控制管理器指示错误。Set the property to a non-zero value before stopping the service to indicate an error to the Service Control Manager.

summary.span: 指示服务名称的最大大小。

span.span: Indicates the maximum size for a service name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ServiceName 和 DisplayName 都具有大小限制, 在设置服务类的属性时必须遵循这些限制。ServiceName and DisplayName both have size restrictions that must be observed when setting the properties on your service class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnContinue() cil managed
abstract member OnContinue : unit -> unit override this.OnContinue : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时， 于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 将“继续”命令发送到服务时运行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, runs when a Continue command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定要在服务暂停后恢复正常功能时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service resumes normal functioning after being paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 , 以便将应用程序的响应镜像到。Implement to mirror your application's response to . 当你通过服务控制台或以编程方式继续服务时, 处理将运行, 并且服务将再次变为活动状态。When you continue the service (either through the Services console or programmatically), the processing runs, and the service becomes active again. 当属性为`true`时, 应重写。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`. 如果 为`false`, 则 SCM 将不会向服务传递暂停或继续请求, 因此, 不会调用和方法, 即使它们是实现的。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if they are implemented. 在`Pause` SCM 中, 在为`Continue` `false`时禁用和控件。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCustomCommand(int32 command) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCustomCommand (command As Integer)
abstract member OnCustomCommand : int -> unit override this.OnCustomCommand : int -> unit

param.name: command
param.span: 发送给服务的命令消息。

span.span: The command message sent to the service.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时， 于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 向服务传递自定义命令时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the Service Control Manager (SCM) passes a custom command to the service.

summary.span: 指定要在具有指定参数值的命令出现时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a command with the specified parameter value occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你指定除启动、停止、暂停和继续服务以外的其他功能。 lets you specify additional functionality beyond starting, stopping, pausing and continuing services. SCM 不检查自定义命令来验证服务是否支持传入的`command`参数。The SCM does not examine the custom command to verify whether the service supports the `command` parameter passed in. 它将自定义命令直接传递给服务。It passes the custom command directly to the service. 如果服务不能识别`command`参数, 则不会执行任何操作。If the service does not recognize the `command` parameter, it does nothing. 自定义命令由 组件中的语句引发。Custom commands are raised by an statement in a component. 使用 switch 语句或 if .。。用于处理在服务上定义的自定义命令的条件。Use a switch statement or if..then condition to handle the custom commands you define on your service. 可在应用程序中定义或在中使用的自定义命令的唯一值是128和255之间的值。The only values for a custom command that you can define in your application or use in are those between 128 and 255. 低于128的整数对应于系统保留值。Integers below 128 correspond to system-reserved values. 如果属性为`true`, 则自定义命令 (如所有其他命令) 将条目写入事件日志, 以报告方法执行是成功还是失败。 If the property is `true`, custom commands, like all other commands, write entries to the event log to report whether the method execution succeeded or failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPause() cil managed
abstract member OnPause : unit -> unit override this.OnPause : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，该方法于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 将“暂停”命令发送到服务时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Pause command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定要在服务暂停时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service pauses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于指定在服务接收暂停命令时发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Pause command. 当属性为`true`时, 应重写。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`. 当你通过服务控制台或以编程方式继续暂停的服务时, 将运行处理, 并且该服务将再次变为活动状态。When you continue a paused service (either through the Services console or programmatically), the processing is run, and the service becomes active again. Pause 命令仅允许应用程序响应特定事件。The Pause command only allows your application to react to a specific event. 对未定义的服务执行任何操作。 does nothing to the service that you do not define it to do. 向服务发送暂停请求可能会保留系统资源, 因为暂停无需释放所有系统资源。Sending a Pause request to the service can conserve system resources because Pause need not release all system resources. 例如, 如果线程已由进程打开, 则暂停服务而不是停止它可以使线程保持打开状态, 避免在服务继续时需要重新分配它们。For example, if threads have been opened by the process, pausing a service rather than stopping it can allow the threads to remain open, obviating the need to reallocate them when the service continues. 如果将 Pause 定义为释放所有系统资源, 它的行为类似于停止命令。If you define Pause to release all system resources, it behaves like a Stop command. 设置 为`true`, 并重写和 , 以指定当 SCM 向服务传递暂停或继续请求时应发生的处理。Set to `true`, and override and to specify the processing that should occur when the SCM passes a Pause or Continue request to your service. 应实现以撤消中的处理。 should be implemented to undo the processing in . 如果 为`false`, 则 SCM 将不会向服务传递暂停或继续请求, 因此, 即使实现了, 也不会调用和方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if implemented. 在`Pause` SCM 中, 在为`Continue` `false`时禁用和控件。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnPowerEvent(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus powerStatus) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnPowerEvent (powerStatus As PowerBroadcastStatus) As Boolean
abstract member OnPowerEvent : System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus -> bool override this.OnPowerEvent : System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus -> bool

param.name: powerStatus
param.span: ，指示来自系统的有关电源状态的通知。

span.span: A that indicates a notification from the system about its power status.

summary.span: 当在派生类中实现时，该方法于计算机电源状态更改时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the computer's power status has changed.

summary.span: 这适用于膝上型计算机进入挂起模式时的情况，该模式不同于系统关闭。

span.span: This applies to laptop computers when they go into suspended mode, which is not the same as a system shutdown.

returns.span: 当在派生类中实现时，应用程序的需要将确定要返回的值。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, the needs of your application determine what value to return.

returns.span: 例如，如果传递了 广播状态，则可以通过返回 来使应用程序拒绝查询。

span.span: For example, if a broadcast status is passed, you could cause your application to reject the query by returning .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于指定在枚举中指示的系统事件发生时所发生的处理过程, 例如, 当计算机处于挂起模式或指示电池电量不足时。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the system event indicated in the enumeration occurs--for example, when the computer is placed in suspended mode or indicates low battery power. 当属性为`true`时, 应重写。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSessionChange(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription changeDescription) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSessionChange (changeDescription As SessionChangeDescription)
abstract member OnSessionChange : System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription -> unit override this.OnSessionChange : System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription -> unit

span.span: A structure that identifies the change type.

summary.span: 从终端服务器会话接收到更改事件时执行。

span.span: Executes when a change event is received from a Terminal Server session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须将属性设置为`true`以启用此方法的执行。You must set the property to `true` to enable the execution of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnShutdown() cil managed
abstract member OnShutdown : unit -> unit override this.OnShutdown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，该方法于系统即将关闭时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the system is shutting down.

summary.span: 该方法指定应在系统即将关闭前执行的处理。

span.span: Specifies what should occur immediately prior to the system shutting down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于指定系统关闭时进行的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the system shuts down. 此事件仅在操作系统关闭时出现, 而不在计算机关闭时发生。This event occurs only when the operating system is shut down, not when the computer is turned off. 当属性为`true`时, 应重写。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStart(string[] args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnStart (args As String())
abstract member OnStart : string[] -> unit override this.OnStart : string[] -> unit

span.span: Data passed by the start command.

summary.span: 当在派生类中实现时，在下列情况下执行：在“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 向服务发送“开始”命令时，或者在操作系统启动时（对于自动启动的服务）。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Start command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM) or when the operating system starts (for a service that starts automatically).

summary.span: 指定服务启动时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when the service starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于指定在服务接收开始命令时发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Start command. 用于指定服务的行为的方法。 is the method in which you specify the behavior of the service. 可以采用自变量作为传递数据的一种方法, 但这种用法非常罕见。 can take arguments as a way to pass data, but this usage is rare. > [!CAUTION] > 不要使用构造函数来执行应该在中的处理。Do not use the constructor to perform processing that should be in . 使用处理服务的所有初始化。Use to handle all initialization of your service. 此构造函数在应用程序的可执行文件运行时调用, 而不是在服务运行时调用。The constructor is called when the application's executable runs, not when the service runs. 可执行文件在之前运行。The executable runs before . 例如, 当继续操作时, 不会再次调用构造函数, 因为 SCM 已在内存中保存对象。When you continue, for example, the constructor is not called again because the SCM already holds the object in memory. 如果释放在构造函数中分配的资源而不是, 则在第二次调用服务时, 不会再次创建所需的资源。If releases resources allocated in the constructor rather than in , the needed resources would not be created again the second time the service is called. 在计算机重新启动时, 可以将服务设置为自动启动, 方法是将该服务的安装程序上的设置为。Services can be set to start automatically when the computer reboots by setting the on the service's installer to . 在这种情况下 , 将在系统启动时调用。In such a situation, would be called at system startup. 应在派生类中重写。 is expected to be overridden in the derived class. 若要使服务有用, 应在服务类中实现。For the service to be useful, and should both be implemented in your service class. 方法中的服务的处理初始化参数, 而不是在 Main 方法中。Process initialization arguments for the service in the method, not in the Main method. 可以在 "服务`args` " 控制台中服务的 "属性" 窗口中手动设置参数数组中的参数。The arguments in the `args` parameter array can be set manually in the properties window for the service in the Services console. 不保存在控制台中输入的参数;从 "控制面板" 启动该服务时, 它们将一次性传递到服务。The arguments entered in the console are not saved; they are passed to the service on a one-time basis when the service is started from the control panel. 自动启动服务时必须存在的参数可放置在服务注册表项的 ImagePath 字符串值中 (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\*).Arguments that must be present when the service is automatically started can be placed in the ImagePath string value for the service's registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\*). 您可以使用方法从注册表获取参数, 例如: `string[] imagePathArgs = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs();`。You can obtain the arguments from the registry using the method, for example: `string[] imagePathArgs = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs();`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStop() cil managed
abstract member OnStop : unit -> unit override this.OnStop : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，该方法于“服务控制管理器”(SCM) 将“停止”命令发送到服务时执行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Stop command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定服务停止运行时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service stops running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于指定在服务接收到 Stop 命令时发生的处理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Stop command. 当 SCM 收到停止命令时, 它将使用的值来验证服务是否接受停止命令。When the SCM receives a Stop command, it uses the value of to verify whether the service accepts Stop commands. 如果 为`true`, 则将停止命令传递给服务, 并在定义方法时调用。If is `true`, the Stop command is passed to the service, and the method is called if it is defined. 如果在服务中未实现, 则 SCM 处理 Stop 命令。If is not implemented in the service, the SCM handles the Stop command. 如果 为`false`, 则 SCM 忽略停止命令。If is `false`, the SCM ignores the Stop command. 它不会传递给服务。It is not passed to the service. Stop 命令返回并引发异常。The Stop command returns and throws an exception. 应在派生类中重写。 is expected to be overridden in the derived class. 若要使服务有用, 应在服务类中实现。For the service to be useful, and should both be implemented in your service class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestAdditionalTime(int32 milliseconds) cil managed

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: 请求的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The requested time in milliseconds.

summary.span: 为挂起操作请求额外的时间。

span.span: Requests additional time for a pending operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在由重写的、、或方法调用, 以请求挂起操作的额外时间, 以防止服务控制管理器 (SCM) 标记服务不响应。The method is intended to be called by the overridden , , , or methods to request additional time for a pending operation, to prevent the Service Control Manager (SCM) from marking the service as not responding. 如果挂起操作不是 "继续"、"暂停"、"启动" 或 "停止", 则会引发。If the pending operation is not a continue, pause, start, or stop, an is thrown.

span.span: The service is not in a pending state.

summary.span: 为服务可执行文件提供主入口点。

span.span: Provides the main entry point for a service executable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run(class System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase service) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Run (service As ServiceBase)

span.span: A which indicates a service to start.

summary.span: 在服务控制管理器 (SCM) 中注册服务的可执行文件。

span.span: Registers the executable for a service with the Service Control Manager (SCM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务可执行文件`main()`的函数中调用此重载, 以向服务控制管理器注册该服务。Call this overload in the `main()` function of the service executable to register the service with the Service Control Manager. 调用后, 服务控制管理器将发出一个启动命令, 该命令将导致调用服务中的方法。After you call , the Service Control Manager issues a Start command, which results in a call to the method in the service. 在执行开始命令之前, 不会启动该服务。The service is not started until the Start command is executed. 调用方法的方式与 Windows 窗体应用程序的方式几乎相同。 The method is called in much the same way as for Windows Forms applications. 如果 `service`为`true`, 则如果参数指定的服务无法启动, 则会将一个项写入事件日志。If is `true`, an entry is written to the event log if the service specified by the `service` parameter fails to start.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run(class System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase[] services) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Run (services As ServiceBase())

param.name: services
param.span: 一组 ServiceBase 实例，指示要启动的服务。

span.span: An array of ServiceBase instances, which indicate services to start.

summary.span: 在服务控制管理器 (SCM) 中注册多项服务的可执行文件。

span.span: Registers the executable for multiple services with the Service Control Manager (SCM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务可执行文件`main()`的函数中调用此重载, 将服务注册到服务控制管理器。Call this overload in the `main()` function of the service executable to register the services with the Service Control Manager. 调用后, 服务控制管理器会发出启动命令, 从而导致对服务中的方法的调用。After you call , the Service Control Manager issues Start commands, which result in calls to the methods in the services. 在执行开始命令之前, 服务不会启动。The services are not started until the Start commands are executed. 调用方法的方式与 Windows 窗体应用程序的方法大致相同。 The method is called in much the same way as the method for Windows Forms applications. 如果 为`true`, 则当数组中的任何服务启动失败时, 会向事件日志写入一项。If is `true`, an entry is written to the event log if any service in the array fails to start.

span.span: You did not supply a service to start.

exception.span: 该数组可能为 或空。

span.span: The array might be or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceHandle As IntPtr
protected: property IntPtr ServiceHandle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 获取服务的服务控制句柄。

span.span: Gets the service control handle for the service.

value.span: 一个 结构，包含服务的服务控制句柄。

span.span: An structure that contains the service control handle for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务控制句柄用于与服务控制管理器 (SCM) 进行通信。The service control handle is used to communicate with the Service Control Manager (SCM). 该句柄可用于使用非托管`SetServiceStatus`函数为调用服务更新服务控制管理器的状态信息。The handle can be used to update the service control manager's status information for the calling service using the unmanaged `SetServiceStatus` function.

span.span: for access to unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public void ServiceMainCallback (int argCount, IntPtr argPointer);

Public Sub ServiceMainCallback (argCount As Integer, argPointer As IntPtr)
public: void ServiceMainCallback(int argCount, IntPtr argPointer);

param.name: argCount
param.span: 参数数组中的参数个数。

span.span: The number of arguments in the argument array.

param.name: argPointer
param.span: 指向参数数组的 结构。

span.span: An structure that points to an array of arguments.

summary.span: 注册命令处理程序并启动服务。

span.span: Registers the command handler and starts the service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ServiceName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ServiceName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于向系统标识服务的简短名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the short name used to identify the service to the system.
The name of the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向服务控制管理器标识服务。The identifies the service to the Service Control Manager. 此属性的值必须与在相应的安装程序类的属性中为服务记录的名称相同。The value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the property of the corresponding installer class. 在代码中, 服务的通常`main()`在可执行文件的函数中设置。In code, the of the service is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable. 还可用于指定与属性关联的。 The is also used to specify the associated with the property. 这是将服务命令信息写入应用程序日志的实例。This is an instance that writes service command information to the Application log. 在服务写入事件日志之前, 必须设置用于提供事件日志的源字符串的。The , which supplies the source string for the event log, must be set before the service writes to the event log. 尝试在设置源名称之前访问事件日志会导致引发异常。Trying to access the event log before the source name is set causes an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 在服务启动后不能更改 属性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

exception.span: 指定的名称为零长度字符串，或长于 ，就或者指定的名称包含前斜线或后斜线字符。

span.span: The specified name is a zero-length string or is longer than , or the specified name contains forward slash or backslash characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止执行服务。

span.span: Stops the executing service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将服务状态设置为指示停止处于挂起状态, 并调用方法。 The method sets the service state to indicate a stop is pending and calls the method. 停止应用程序后, 服务状态将设置为 "已停止"。After the application is stopped, the service state is set to stopped. 如果应用程序是托管服务, 则卸载应用程序域。If the application is a hosted service, the application domain is unloaded.
